question: Student topics: Create output for SC-900 learner (advanced) with 6 hours a week over 8 weeks. Weekly study hours: 6 Duration in weeks: 8  Produce JSON only matching the provided schema
context: Scenario SCN-001: ambiguity=underspecified, noise=outdated-links, target exam=AZ-104.
model_answer: {"modules":[{"title":"Describe security and compliance concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-concepts-methodologies/","skillFocus":"Security/compliance fundamentals: shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, data residency/sovereignty, GRC concepts."},{"title":"Describe identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-principles-concepts/","skillFocus":"Identity fundamentals: authentication vs authorization, identity providers, directory services, federation; identity as a security perimeter."},{"title":"Describe the function and identity types of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-basic-services-identity-types/","skillFocus":"Entra ID fundamentals: what Entra ID is, identity types, and hybrid identity concepts."},{"title":"Describe the authentication capabilities of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-authentication-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Authentication features: MFA, SSPR, and password protection/management capabilities."},{"title":"Describe access management capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-access-management-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Access management: Conditional Access, roles/RBAC, and related access-control capabilities."},{"title":"Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-protection-governance-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Identity Protection and governance: risk-based protection concepts and governance capabilities (including reviews/PIM concepts at fundamentals level)."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft Security Copilot","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/security-copilot-getting-started/","skillFocus":"Security Copilot fundamentals: what it is, how prompting works, and how it’s used in Microsoft security workflows."},{"title":"Describe core infrastructure security services in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-basic-security-capabilities-azure/","skillFocus":"Azure security controls: network/platform security basics such as firewalling, segmentation, and protecting workloads/data."},{"title":"Describe the security management capabilities in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-management-capabilities-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Defender for Cloud basics: secure posture management concepts, recommendations, and workload protection overview."},{"title":"Describe security capabilities of Microsoft Sentinel","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-capabilities-of-azure-sentinel/","skillFocus":"SIEM/SOAR fundamentals: what Sentinel does and how it supports detection/response in Microsoft’s ecosystem."},{"title":"Describe threat protection with Microsoft Defender XDR","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-threat-protection-with-microsoft-365-defender/","skillFocus":"Defender XDR suite overview: how Microsoft’s threat protection spans identities, endpoints, email, and apps."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft’s Service Trust portal and privacy capabilities","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-compliance-management-capabilities-microsoft/","skillFocus":"Trust/privacy fundamentals: Service Trust Portal purpose and Microsoft Priva overview."},{"title":"Describe the data security solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-solutions/","skillFocus":"Purview data security: information protection concepts such as labeling and data protection capabilities (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data compliance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-risk-compliance-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview compliance/risk: capabilities for managing compliance requirements and organizational risk (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data governance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview governance overview: governance concepts and how Purview supports data governance outcomes."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to AZ-104 for a intermediate learner with 5h/week over 5 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam relevance.","learningPaths":[{"estimatedHours":6,"title":"Introduction to security, compliance, and identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-concepts-of-security-compliance-identity/","relevance":"Covers the foundational security/compliance/identity concepts SC-900 expects you to know cold (shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, identity basics). As an advanced learner, you can move quickly and use it to ensure terminology and models match Microsoft’s exam framing."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-identity-access/","relevance":"Directly maps to the SC-900 Entra domain (identity types, authentication methods/MFA/SSPR, Conditional Access, RBAC, Identity Protection, and governance). This is a high-yield area for the exam and a core prerequisite for deeper Microsoft security topics."},{"estimatedHours":18,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft security solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-security-solutions/","relevance":"SC-900 is most heavily weighted toward Microsoft security solutions. This path covers Azure security controls, Defender for Cloud, Sentinel (SIEM/SOAR), and Defender XDR components—topics that commonly appear in scenario-based fundamental questions."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Priva and Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-compliance-solutions/","relevance":"Covers the compliance portion of the exam: Service Trust Portal, privacy principles/Priva, and Microsoft Purview capabilities across data security, compliance, and governance. This completes the SC-900 objective coverage and helps avoid missing compliance-heavy questions."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam AZ-104 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/sc-900/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/security-compliance-and-identity-fundamentals/","type":"Certification"}]}

model_answer: {"modules":[{"title":"Describe security and compliance concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-concepts-methodologies/","skillFocus":"Security/compliance fundamentals: shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, data residency/sovereignty, GRC concepts."},{"title":"Describe identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-principles-concepts/","skillFocus":"Identity fundamentals: authentication vs authorization, identity providers, directory services, federation; identity as a security perimeter."},{"title":"Describe the function and identity types of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-basic-services-identity-types/","skillFocus":"Entra ID fundamentals: what Entra ID is, identity types, and hybrid identity concepts."},{"title":"Describe the authentication capabilities of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-authentication-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Authentication features: MFA, SSPR, and password protection/management capabilities."},{"title":"Describe access management capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-access-management-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Access management: Conditional Access, roles/RBAC, and related access-control capabilities."},{"title":"Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-protection-governance-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Identity Protection and governance: risk-based protection concepts and governance capabilities (including reviews/PIM concepts at fundamentals level)."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft Security Copilot","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/security-copilot-getting-started/","skillFocus":"Security Copilot fundamentals: what it is, how prompting works, and how it’s used in Microsoft security workflows."},{"title":"Describe core infrastructure security services in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-basic-security-capabilities-azure/","skillFocus":"Azure security controls: network/platform security basics such as firewalling, segmentation, and protecting workloads/data."},{"title":"Describe the security management capabilities in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-management-capabilities-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Defender for Cloud basics: secure posture management concepts, recommendations, and workload protection overview."},{"title":"Describe security capabilities of Microsoft Sentinel","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-capabilities-of-azure-sentinel/","skillFocus":"SIEM/SOAR fundamentals: what Sentinel does and how it supports detection/response in Microsoft’s ecosystem."},{"title":"Describe threat protection with Microsoft Defender XDR","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-threat-protection-with-microsoft-365-defender/","skillFocus":"Defender XDR suite overview: how Microsoft’s threat protection spans identities, endpoints, email, and apps."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft’s Service Trust portal and privacy capabilities","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-compliance-management-capabilities-microsoft/","skillFocus":"Trust/privacy fundamentals: Service Trust Portal purpose and Microsoft Priva overview."},{"title":"Describe the data security solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-solutions/","skillFocus":"Purview data security: information protection concepts such as labeling and data protection capabilities (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data compliance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-risk-compliance-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview compliance/risk: capabilities for managing compliance requirements and organizational risk (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data governance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview governance overview: governance concepts and how Purview supports data governance outcomes."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to AI-102 for a intermediate learner with 6h/week over 4 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam relevance.","learningPaths":[{"estimatedHours":6,"title":"Introduction to security, compliance, and identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-concepts-of-security-compliance-identity/","relevance":"Covers the foundational security/compliance/identity concepts SC-900 expects you to know cold (shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, identity basics). As an advanced learner, you can move quickly and use it to ensure terminology and models match Microsoft’s exam framing."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-identity-access/","relevance":"Directly maps to the SC-900 Entra domain (identity types, authentication methods/MFA/SSPR, Conditional Access, RBAC, Identity Protection, and governance). This is a high-yield area for the exam and a core prerequisite for deeper Microsoft security topics."},{"estimatedHours":18,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft security solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-security-solutions/","relevance":"SC-900 is most heavily weighted toward Microsoft security solutions. This path covers Azure security controls, Defender for Cloud, Sentinel (SIEM/SOAR), and Defender XDR components—topics that commonly appear in scenario-based fundamental questions."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Priva and Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-compliance-solutions/","relevance":"Covers the compliance portion of the exam: Service Trust Portal, privacy principles/Priva, and Microsoft Purview capabilities across data security, compliance, and governance. This completes the SC-900 objective coverage and helps avoid missing compliance-heavy questions."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam AI-102 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/sc-900/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/security-compliance-and-identity-fundamentals/","type":"Certification"}]}

model_answer: {"modules":[{"title":"Describe the core architectural components of Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-core-architectural-components-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Azure architecture fundamentals (regions, availability, resource organization) for design tradeoffs."},{"title":"Introduction to the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cloud-adoption-framework/","skillFocus":"Strategy and governance guidance used in architect scenario questions."},{"title":"Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/azure-well-architected-introduction/","skillFocus":"Architect decision-making across reliability, security, cost optimization, operational excellence, and performance efficiency."},{"title":"Design governance","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-governance/","skillFocus":"Designing management groups/subscriptions/resource groups, policy/compliance, and governance approaches."},{"title":"Design authentication and authorization solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-authentication-authorization-solutions/","skillFocus":"Choosing identity/auth patterns and access control approaches for Azure and hybrid."},{"title":"Design a solution to log and monitor Azure resources","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-solution-to-log-monitor-azure-resources/","skillFocus":"Designing logging, monitoring, and routing/analysis of telemetry for Azure resources."},{"title":"Design a data storage solution for non-relational data","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-storage-solution-for-non-relational-data/","skillFocus":"Selecting non-relational stores (and protections/durability) based on requirements."},{"title":"Design a data storage solution for relational data","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-storage-solution-for-relational-data/","skillFocus":"Selecting relational services/tiers and designing for scalability and protection."},{"title":"Design data integration","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-integration/","skillFocus":"Designing integration approaches for moving/transforming data between services."},{"title":"Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-high-availability-disaster-recovery-strategies/","skillFocus":"RTO/RPO-driven HA/DR strategy selection for IaaS/PaaS/hybrid."},{"title":"Design a solution for backup and disaster recovery","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-solution-for-backup-disaster-recovery/","skillFocus":"Selecting Azure backup and disaster recovery solutions for different workloads."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to AZ-305 for a intermediate learner with 9h/week over 7 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam relevance.","learningPaths":[{"estimatedHours":8,"title":"AZ-305 Microsoft Azure Architect Design Prerequisites","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/microsoft-azure-architect-design-prerequisites/","relevance":"Best-fit baseline for an intermediate learner: quickly refreshes Azure core architecture components plus Cloud Adoption Framework and Azure Well-Architected Framework, which are repeatedly referenced in AZ-305 design decisions."},{"estimatedHours":5,"title":"AZ-305: Design identity, governance, and monitor solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/design-identity-governance-monitor-solutions/","relevance":"Directly targets the AZ-305 domain “Design identity, governance, and monitoring solutions” (a major portion of the exam). Covers governance structure, authN/authZ design, and monitoring/logging design choices."},{"estimatedHours":5,"title":"AZ-305: Design data storage solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/design-data-storage-solutions/","relevance":"Directly targets the AZ-305 domain “Design data storage solutions.” Helps you practice selecting between relational/non-relational services and designing data integration patterns—key architect decisions tested on AZ-305."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam AZ-305 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/az-305/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-solutions-architect/","type":"Certification"}]}

As an advanced learner, you can move quickly and use it to ensure terminology and models match Microsoft’s exam framing."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-identity-access/","relevance":"Directly maps to the SC-900 Entra domain (identity types, authentication methods/MFA/SSPR, Conditional Access, RBAC, Identity Protection, and governance). concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-principles-concepts/","skillFocus":"Identity fundamentals: authentication vs authorization, identity providers, concepts."},{"title":"Describe the authentication capabilities of Microsoft Entra management: Conditional Access, roles/RBAC, and related access-control capabilities."},{"title":"Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-protection-governance-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Identity Protection and governance: risk-based protection concepts and Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-management-capabilities-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Defender for Cloud basics: secure posture management concepts, recommendations, and workload protection overview."},{"title":"Describe security capabilities of Microsoft Sentinel","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-capabilities-of-azure-sentinel/","skillFocus":"SIEM/SOAR fundamentals: what Sentinel does and how it supports XDR","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-threat-protection-with-microsoft-365-defender/","skillFocus":"Defender XDR suite overview: how Microsoft’s threat protection spans capabilities","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-compliance-management-capabilities-microsoft/","skillFocus":"Trust/privacy fundamentals: Service Trust Portal purpose and Microsoft Priva overview."},{"title":"Describe the data security solutions of Microsoft capabilities (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data compliance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-risk-compliance-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview compliance/risk: capabilities for managing compliance requirements and organizational risk (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data governance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview governance overview: governance concepts and how Purview supports data governance outcomes."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to SC-900 for a intermediate learner with 7h/week over 13 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam expects you to know cold (shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, identity basics). As an advanced learner, you can move quickly and use it to ensure terminology and models match Microsoft’s exam framing."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-identity-access/","relevance":"Directly maps to the SC-900 Entra domain (identity types, authentication methods/MFA/SSPR, Conditional Access, RBAC, Identity Protection, and governance). This is a high-yield area for the exam and a core prerequisite for deeper Microsoft security topics."},{"estimatedHours":18,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft security solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-security-solutions/","relevance":"SC-900 is most heavily weighted toward Microsoft security solutions. This path covers Azure security controls, Defender for Cloud, Sentinel (SIEM/SOAR), and Defender XDR components—topics that commonly appear in scenario-based fundamental questions."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Priva and Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-compliance-solutions/","relevance":"Covers the compliance portion of the exam: Service Trust Portal, privacy principles/Priva, and Microsoft Purview capabilities across data security, compliance, and governance. This completes the SC-900 objective coverage and helps avoid missing compliance-heavy questions."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam SC-900 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/sc-900/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/security-compliance-and-identity-fundamentals/","type":"Certification"}]}

model_answer: {"modules":[{"title":"Describe the core architectural components of Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-core-architectural-components-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Azure architecture fundamentals (regions, availability, resource organization) for design tradeoffs."},{"title":"Introduction to the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/cloud-adoption-framework/","skillFocus":"Strategy and governance guidance used in architect scenario questions."},{"title":"Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/azure-well-architected-introduction/","skillFocus":"Architect decision-making across reliability, security, cost optimization, operational excellence, and performance efficiency."},{"title":"Design governance","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-governance/","skillFocus":"Designing management groups/subscriptions/resource groups, policy/compliance, and governance approaches."},{"title":"Design authentication and authorization solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-authentication-authorization-solutions/","skillFocus":"Choosing identity/auth patterns and access control approaches for Azure and hybrid."},{"title":"Design a solution to log and monitor Azure resources","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-solution-to-log-monitor-azure-resources/","skillFocus":"Designing logging, monitoring, and routing/analysis of telemetry for Azure resources."},{"title":"Design a data storage solution for non-relational data","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-storage-solution-for-non-relational-data/","skillFocus":"Selecting non-relational stores (and protections/durability) based on requirements."},{"title":"Design a data storage solution for relational data","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-storage-solution-for-relational-data/","skillFocus":"Selecting relational services/tiers and designing for scalability and protection."},{"title":"Design data integration","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-data-integration/","skillFocus":"Designing integration approaches for moving/transforming data between services."},{"title":"Describe high availability and disaster recovery strategies","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-high-availability-disaster-recovery-strategies/","skillFocus":"RTO/RPO-driven HA/DR strategy selection for IaaS/PaaS/hybrid."},{"title":"Design a solution for backup and disaster recovery","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/design-solution-for-backup-disaster-recovery/","skillFocus":"Selecting Azure backup and disaster recovery solutions for different workloads."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to AZ-204 for a intermediate learner with 10h/week over 6 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam relevance.","learningPaths":[{"estimatedHours":8,"title":"AZ-305 Microsoft Azure Architect Design Prerequisites","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/microsoft-azure-architect-design-prerequisites/","relevance":"Best-fit baseline for an intermediate learner: quickly refreshes Azure core architecture components plus Cloud Adoption Framework and Azure Well-Architected Framework, which are repeatedly referenced in AZ-305 design decisions."},{"estimatedHours":5,"title":"AZ-305: Design identity, governance, and monitor solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/design-identity-governance-monitor-solutions/","relevance":"Directly targets the AZ-305 domain “Design identity, governance, and monitoring solutions” (a major portion of the exam). Covers governance structure, authN/authZ design, and monitoring/logging design choices."},{"estimatedHours":5,"title":"AZ-305: Design data storage solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/design-data-storage-solutions/","relevance":"Directly targets the AZ-305 domain “Design data storage solutions.” Helps you practice selecting between relational/non-relational services and designing data integration patterns—key architect decisions tested on AZ-305."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam AZ-204 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/az-305/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-solutions-architect/","type":"Certification"}]}

model_answer: {"modules":[{"title":"Describe security and compliance concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-concepts-methodologies/","skillFocus":"Security/compliance fundamentals: shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, data residency/sovereignty, GRC concepts."},{"title":"Describe identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-principles-concepts/","skillFocus":"Identity fundamentals: authentication vs authorization, identity providers, directory services, federation; identity as a security perimeter."},{"title":"Describe the function and identity types of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-basic-services-identity-types/","skillFocus":"Entra ID fundamentals: what Entra ID is, identity types, and hybrid identity concepts."},{"title":"Describe the authentication capabilities of Microsoft Entra ID","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-authentication-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Authentication features: MFA, SSPR, and password protection/management capabilities."},{"title":"Describe access management capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/explore-access-management-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Access management: Conditional Access, roles/RBAC, and related access-control capabilities."},{"title":"Describe the identity protection and governance capabilities of Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-identity-protection-governance-capabilities/","skillFocus":"Identity Protection and governance: risk-based protection concepts and governance capabilities (including reviews/PIM concepts at fundamentals level)."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft Security Copilot","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/security-copilot-getting-started/","skillFocus":"Security Copilot fundamentals: what it is, how prompting works, and how it’s used in Microsoft security workflows."},{"title":"Describe core infrastructure security services in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-basic-security-capabilities-azure/","skillFocus":"Azure security controls: network/platform security basics such as firewalling, segmentation, and protecting workloads/data."},{"title":"Describe the security management capabilities in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-management-capabilities-of-azure/","skillFocus":"Defender for Cloud basics: secure posture management concepts, recommendations, and workload protection overview."},{"title":"Describe security capabilities of Microsoft Sentinel","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-security-capabilities-of-azure-sentinel/","skillFocus":"SIEM/SOAR fundamentals: what Sentinel does and how it supports detection/response in Microsoft’s ecosystem."},{"title":"Describe threat protection with Microsoft Defender XDR","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-threat-protection-with-microsoft-365-defender/","skillFocus":"Defender XDR suite overview: how Microsoft’s threat protection spans identities, endpoints, email, and apps."},{"title":"Describe Microsoft’s Service Trust portal and privacy capabilities","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-compliance-management-capabilities-microsoft/","skillFocus":"Trust/privacy fundamentals: Service Trust Portal purpose and Microsoft Priva overview."},{"title":"Describe the data security solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-solutions/","skillFocus":"Purview data security: information protection concepts such as labeling and data protection capabilities (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data compliance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-risk-compliance-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview compliance/risk: capabilities for managing compliance requirements and organizational risk (fundamentals scope)."},{"title":"Describe the data governance solutions of Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/describe-purview-data-governance/","skillFocus":"Purview governance overview: governance concepts and how Purview supports data governance outcomes."}],"rationale":"Recommendations are aligned to DP-900 for a intermediate learner with 8h/week over 12 weeks, prioritizing Microsoft Learn resources and exam relevance.","learningPaths":[{"estimatedHours":6,"title":"Introduction to security, compliance, and identity concepts","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-concepts-of-security-compliance-identity/","relevance":"Covers the foundational security/compliance/identity concepts SC-900 expects you to know cold (shared responsibility, Zero Trust, encryption/hashing, identity basics). As an advanced learner, you can move quickly and use it to ensure terminology and models match Microsoft’s exam framing."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Entra","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-identity-access/","relevance":"Directly maps to the SC-900 Entra domain (identity types, authentication methods/MFA/SSPR, Conditional Access, RBAC, Identity Protection, and governance). This is a high-yield area for the exam and a core prerequisite for deeper Microsoft security topics."},{"estimatedHours":18,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft security solutions","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-security-solutions/","relevance":"SC-900 is most heavily weighted toward Microsoft security solutions. This path covers Azure security controls, Defender for Cloud, Sentinel (SIEM/SOAR), and Defender XDR components—topics that commonly appear in scenario-based fundamental questions."},{"estimatedHours":12,"title":"Introduction to Microsoft Priva and Microsoft Purview","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/describe-capabilities-of-microsoft-compliance-solutions/","relevance":"Covers the compliance portion of the exam: Service Trust Portal, privacy principles/Priva, and Microsoft Purview capabilities across data security, compliance, and governance. This completes the SC-900 objective coverage and helps avoid missing compliance-heavy questions."}],"targets":[{"title":"Exam DP-900 readiness track","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/sc-900/","type":"Exam"},{"title":"Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/security-compliance-and-identity-fundamentals/","type":"Certification"}]}
